basic_information.scholarship_name: Natalie Taylor Endowed Scholarship for Student Teachers

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are student teaching in the upcoming academic year. Eligibility Requirements Must be admitted to Teacher Education Min 3.0 GPA Demonstrates financial need Short essay describing plan to work in public education within the state of Oklahoma after graduation Preference given to those with outside or student organization involvement Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall or spring semester to receive award All funds from this scholarship will be distributed during student teaching Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
